basic.description: The geology of the Precambrian, Paleozoic, and Cenozoic eras is introduced in this course. Students are introduced to mapping technologies and the `art' of visualization. Topics include basic geological structures, historical geology, and physical processes such as glaciation. Mineralogy is introduced through the physical properties of minerals.
basic.subject: MNTC
basic.title: Mining Geology

extra.enrollment_requirement: Must be registered in the BTECH Program
